benchmark_details.name: Mobile-Eval
benchmark_details.overview: Mobile-Eval is a benchmark designed to assess mobile device agents, comprising 10 commonly used Apps and instructions with varying difficulty levels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the performance of mobile device agents like Mobile-Agent across various demanding tasks.

data.source: Current mainstream mobile apps including Alibaba.com, Amazon Music, Google Maps, etc.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the success of instruction execution and comparison to human performance.
methodology.interpretation: Higher success rates and process scores indicate better performance by the Mobile-Agent.
methodology.validation: Evaluation conducted against a human baseline.
